duties_responsibilities.duty: Conduct environmental assessments and remediation projects, ensuring compliance with federal and state regulations.
Manage groundwater treatment services and oversee construction activities for environmental projects.
Interact with regulatory agencies to ensure adherence to environmental regulations and permit requirements.
Prepare and submit technical reports, proposals, and documents for environmental projects.
Collaborate with project teams, provide strong communication, and interface with clients to ensure project success.
Provide hands-on site management and investigation for environmental projects, ensuring safety and compliance.
Utilize project management skills to lead and supervise environmental project teams effectively.
Demonstrate a strong understanding of environmental regulations, including RCRA, CERCLA, and HSCA.
Communicate effectively with clients, regulatory agencies, and project stakeholders to ensure project success.
Work independently and in a supervisory capacity to oversee all aspects of environmental projects.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Environmental or Civil Engineering (Professional Engineer license required)
